titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act by designating the Pacific Northwest Scenic Trail, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 6/27/1988--Introduced. Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Pacific Northwest Scenic Trail, extending from Cape Alava, Washington, to Glacier Park, Montana, as a component of the National Trails System.
